Posts.Content: Dear jdubious, Hello, I've been on Femara for 8 months.I was gaining so much weight on Aromasin so my doctor put me on Femara.I don't like it. My pain is awful, I sleep all the time and the hot flashes are awful, so my family doctor put me on Effexor to help with the hot flashes and mood swings. Having cancer has just messed me up.I've gained weight and yuk!!My doctor also put me on Sulindac for the joint pain. Good luck
Posts.Title: Femara side effects?
